name: Cursal Reversal
description:
Players will take the role of a potion crafter in a small town, recently struck by an odd affliction. At first glance, the town looks completely normal, but you will soon discover that the villagers are supposed to be monsters! They ask you to return them to their true forms. Players must travel into the nearby dungeon in search of potion ingredients, dropped from enemies or collected from the ground. Players may choose to leave the dungeon once they believe they have collected enough. If they are defeated by enemies, they will lose most of their items. Upon returning to the town,
players can craft new potions, granting them buffs for their next visit to the dungeon.

https://forms.gle/rmm6xRcsTeqx9sbS8

Controls:

E: Interact with Villagers

WASD: Movement

LMB: Cast Spell

RMB: Defense Spell

Scroll Wheel: Switch Spell

Space: Dash

K: Return to Town

1 2 3: Use Potion
